query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS campaignLaunches (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  employerId INT NOT NULL,
  campaignTemplateId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  targetListId INT COMMENT 'Reference to candidateLists table',
  status ENUM('active', 'paused', 'completed', 'cancelled') DEFAULT 'active',
  currentStep INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalRecipients INT DEFAULT 0,
  emailsSent INT DEFAULT 0,
  avgOpenRate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
  avgClickRate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
  launchedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_employer (employerId),
  INDEX idx_template (campaignTemplateId),
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  FOREIGN KEY (campaignTemplateId) REFERENCES campaignTemplates(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

  INDEX idx_status (status),
  FOREIGN KEY (campaignTemplateId) REFERENCES campaignTemplates(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
